question.text: What does actually mean here?
question.input_text: ‘We’re meeting him at the office.’ ‘<item>Actually</item>, we’re meeting him at his hotel.’
option: In fact, we’re not meeting him at the office but at his hotel.
We’re meeting him at his hotel now and at his office later.
question.answer: In fact, we’re not meeting him at the office but at his hotel.

question.text: ‘It’s cold.’ ‘<item>Of course it is.</item>‘

540
Of course could suggest, rather unpleasantly, that the person who said ‘It’s cold’ was remarking on something too obvious to be worth mentioning.
